itemDisplayName: Deploy an Azure App Service, Azure Functions, Speech and LUIS services and deploy the application on Azure App Service and on Azure Function from the source code on github
description: This template allows you to deploy an Azure App Service, Azure Functions, Speech and LUIS services and deploy the application on Azure App Service and on Azure Function from the source code on github
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys an Azure App Service, Azure Functions, Speech and LUIS services and deploy the application on Azure App Service and on Azure Function from the source code on github.
